articles.author: Ben Clatworthy
articles.title: Boost for holidays as America drops pre-departure Covid tests - The Times
articles.description: Passengers travelling to the US will no longer need to take a Covid test before departure.The requirement will be dropped for arrivals by plane from Sunday in w
articles.content:
Passengers travelling to the US will no longer need to take a Covid test before departure.
The requirement will be dropped for arrivals by plane from Sunday in what has been hailed as a huge boost f… [+574 chars]
